bullets: Implemented extreme weather alert service, by creating microservices to get updates from RSS feeds and send SMS messages to subscribed users (API gateway, Lambda, DynamoDB, SNS)

Created internal project template for Firebase, React projects involving auth and storage (Terraform)
Improved top vehicle loss detection model, saving 2M+ annually on Ontario risk sharing pool (dask, scikit-learn, seaborn)
Collected, cleaned, and analyzed internal company and census data to build proof-of-concept fraud detection model (tidyverse, ggplot2)
Automated and migrated deployment and monitoring of property fire risk assessment model to new internal cloud environment (PySpark)

Archived inactive claims data in in-house Oracle data warehouse, improved ETL and query speed by 40% (Python, bash, SQL)
